title: The Prank War Escalation
setting: Redwood Software, engineering floor, Monday 8 AM
premise: Someone filled the CEO's office with hundreds of balloons over the weekend, blocking the door completely. The CEO is not amused and wants the culprit found immediately.

suspects.name: Zach Brennan
suspects.motive: Known office prankster who recently had his own desk wrapped in foil
suspects.alibi: I was at a music festival in Clearwater all weekend. It was a two-hour drive away. I have my wristband and photos with timestamps from both Saturday and Sunday.

suspects.name: Kelly Ortega
suspects.motive: Wanted revenge after the CEO publicly criticized her design in a meeting
suspects.alibi: I spent all weekend at home painting my apartment. I had drop cloths everywhere and my roommate helped me. She can confirm I was home both days.

suspects.name: Todd Nguyen
suspects.motive: Lost a prank bet with Zach and owed him a 'legendary prank' as payment
suspects.alibi: I was at my parents' house in Riverside for Sunday dinner. I drove there Saturday afternoon and came back Sunday evening. My mom can confirm I was there.

suspects.name: Jenna Walsh
suspects.motive: The CEO rejected her project proposal and gave the budget to another team
suspects.alibi: I came into the office Saturday morning around 10 AM to catch up on emails. I was at my desk for about three hours and left around 1 PM. I didn't go near the CEO's office.

clues.title: Balloon Receipt
clues.content: A receipt from Party Planet for 300 balloons and a helium tank was found in the office recycling bin. It was purchased Saturday at 9:15 AM and paid for in cash.

clues.title: Weekend Badge Records
clues.content: Building badge records show Jenna entered at 10:05 AM Saturday and left at 1:12 PM. Todd entered at 2:30 PM Saturday and left at 5:45 PM. No Sunday entries were logged.

clues.title: Riverside Drive Time
clues.content: Todd claims he drove to Riverside on Saturday afternoon. But Riverside is a four-hour drive away, and Clue 2 shows he didn't leave the office until 5:45 PM Saturday â€” arriving impossibly late for Saturday dinner.
